content.about: Tulsa Antique Appraisals provides professional antique appraisal services in the Tulsa area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the greater metropolitan area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Robert W.
reviews.content: Extremely professional and knowledgeable about antique valuation. The appraisal was thorough and delivered on time.

reviews.author: Karen R.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend Tulsa Antique Appraisals for any antique appraisal needs.

reviews.author: Michael B.
reviews.content: Good service overall, though the turnaround time for my antique appraisal was longer than expected.

reviews.author: Sarah C.
reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and they delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.

reviews.author: Michael T.
reviews.content: Very responsive and easy to work with. Their expertise with my antique pocket watch collection was impressive.

content.about: Heritage Valuations Tulsa provides professional antique appraisal services in the Tulsa area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the greater metropolitan area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Jennifer J.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of 19th century antique furniture made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.

reviews.author: Emily M.
reviews.content: Heritage Valuations Tulsa's knowledge of 19th century antique furniture made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.

reviews.author: John T.
reviews.content: Heritage Valuations Tulsa's knowledge of antique furniture values was exceptional. The documentation Heritage Valuations Tulsa provided was detailed and perfect for my insurance needs.

reviews.author: John S.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.
